item.title: Ancient DNA reveals 12,000-year-old case of rare genetic disease - Phys.org
item.description:
1. Ancient DNA reveals 12,000-year-old case of rare genetic disease  Phys.org
  2. Teenage girl who lived in Italy 12,000 years ago had a rare form of dwarfism, DNA study shows  Live Science
